remarks: A nonzero vector in an atom determines the atom.  (Contributed by NM, 3-Feb-2015.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
lsatelb.v $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.
lsatelb.o $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` W ) $.
lsatelb.n $e |- N = ( LSpan ` W ) $.
lsatelb.a $e |- A = ( LSAtoms ` W ) $.
lsatelb.w $e |- ( ph -> W e. LVec ) $.
lsatelb.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. ( V \ { .0. } ) ) $.
lsatelb.u $e |- ( ph -> U e. A ) $.
lsatelbN $p |- ( ph -> ( X e. U <-> U = ( N ` { X } ) ) ) $.
